definitions.definition: To evoke an intense interest or attraction in someone.
examples: The flickering TV fascinated the cat.

definitions.definition: To make someone hold motionless ; to spellbind .
examples: We were fascinated by the potter's skill.

definitions.definition: To be irresistibly charming or attractive to.

main_definition: To evoke an intense interest or attraction in someone.
secondary_definitions: To make someone hold motionless ; to spellbind .
To be irresistibly charming or attractive to.
